title: The case for Apple Books vs Kindle – which is best for you?
content:
I have been using Kindle for most of my e-book needs for the last decade. The last few years, I have been reading on a as it offers additional capabilities than a Paperwhite for a more affordable price tag. Since becoming an Apple user in that time, it’s hard to get over the all-in-one seamless user experience of Apple Books. Now that Apple’s Friday Night Baseball is bringing content to Apple Books, is it a good idea to switch from Kindle?
